metadata.name: THREE MUSKETEERS #1/13
metadata.description:
Waking up for the sunrise is always epic. Or that's how the pictures make it look like. Truth is waking up is a struggle but the rewards, that's something else. 

Early morning at the Malindi Pier, known as the long tongue that flicks into the Indian Ocean, just as I was bringing back the drone so that we can head back to the hotel, the shadows falling off the bridge calling my name. 
"Just one last shot"

First shot. I pause for a few seconds. 
The frame is cool but I feel something is missing. A light bulb moment happens. My shadow which I told myself I'd fix in Photoshop, ends up tickling my fancy. 
I frame my friends for what would be the birth of The Three Musketeers.




Edition: 13/13  
Title: THREE MUSKETEERS  
Location: Malindi Kenya  
Photographer: Trevor Maingi   
Size: 4275 x 3054 @300dpi
